description: Point 1: We don't have classical digital scholarly editions because classicists just don't feel they need them The title says it all. Point 2: They don't feel so because of the "canonisation" of the classical corpus

is_part_of.title: Opinion/Provocation: Why are there no digital scholarly editions of "classical" texts?

title: Point 1: We don't have classical digital scholarly editions because classicists just don't feel they need them
